issue.title: Error: `traindir/likelihood/likelihood.0.ll` and `traindir/likelihood/likelihood.0.ll` are the same file

content.html:
According to the test I've done, single thread case do not make any call to the copy2 at line 1489.

I am not sure about that but my guess would be self.instance_make_new_params is false in single thread case Since we have

    @memoized_property
    def instance_make_new_params(self):
        """
        should I make new parameters in each instance?
        """
        return self.num_instances > 1 or isinstance(self.num_segs, slice)

This forbid the call to proc_train_result

    def finish_train(self, instance_params, dst_filenames):
        if self.instance_make_new_params:
            self.proc_train_results(instance_params, dst_filenames)
